# HMError.Code.operationInProgress

**Case**

An error indicating the operation is already in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
case operationInProgress
```

## Operation errors

- **HMError.Code.operationCancelled**: An error indicating the user canceled the operation.
- **HMError.Code.operationTimedOut**: An error indicating the operation timed out.

items.description: An error indicating the user canceled the operation.
